main: Generates {status:LanternGregBigBird} passively, with defense, or with his 2 {keyword:Gloom} RES passive. At max stacks, consumes it to apply {status:DelusionGregBigBird} to the enemy with the highest HP.
{status:LanternGregBigBird} makes Gregor slower, which buffs his skills. He has a passive that lets him clash with anything regardless of speed to counteract it.

{status:DelusionGregBigBird} is a panic-type changing debuff that makes the enemy take increased damage, makes Gregor stronger against them by triggering his conditionals, and gives them other minor debuffs.

Using his defense on the first turn, lets him apply {status:DelusionGregBigBird} immediately on the 2nd turn. Then he can build up {status:LanternGregBigBird} again on the succeeding turns until it wears off.
other: Any {status:Agility} gained is automatically converted to {status:ParryingResultUp}.
Using his S3 to give him {status:PlusCoinValueUp} is a good setup for an S2 next turn since the S2 is a 4 coin skill.

Triggering his passive gives him +5 SP if an enemy has {status:DelusionGregBigBird} and applies {status:ObedienceGregBigBird} to an ally giving them a bonus SP healing/loss when using a plus/minus coin skill.

1121401.desc:
Combat Start: Gain 1 [LanternGregBigBird]

Combat Start: If an enemy has [DelusionGregBigBird], heal 3 SP

Turn End: Apply [ObedienceGregBigBird] next turn to the ally with the earliest Deployment order among those that do not fit the following conditions:
- Is this unit
- Is an ally with [ObedienceGregBigBird]
- Is an ally that cannot heal SP due to conditions such as Panic or Corrosion
1121401.name: Eyes Bright Like Lamps

1121402.desc:
Turn Start: Gain 1 [LanternGregBigBird]

External effects cannot change this unit's Min. and Max. Speeds

When chaining Skills, this unit can redirect the Attack Skills' targeting to itself regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)

When gaining [Agility], gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] instead (once per turn)
- Once the above effect activates, cannot gain [Agility] for the rest of the turn
1121402.name: Dazzling Lamp

1121403.desc:
Turn Start: Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every ally wearing E.G.O Gears (max 3)

When an ally dies, gain 2 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn (once per turn)
1121403.name: E.G.O Gear Proficiency Manual

1121411.desc:
Combat Start: Gain 1 [LanternGregBigBird] for every 2 Gloom Reson. (max 3)

Combat Start: If an enemy has [DelusionGregBigBird], heal 5 SP

Turn End: Apply [ObedienceGregBigBird] next turn to the ally with the earliest Deployment order among those that do not fit the following conditions:
- Is this unit
- Is an ally with [ObedienceGregBigBird]
- Is an ally that cannot heal SP due to conditions such as Panic or Corrosion
1121411.name: Eyes Bright Like Lamps

1121421.desc:
Turn End: Apply the following to the ally with the earliest Deployment order among those with negative effects
- Gain +4 [Aggro] to the leftmost Slot next turn
- Gain 1 [HitDamageUp] next turn
1121421.name: Were There More Lives to be Saved?

data.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Gain [LanternGregBigBird] up to 8 Stack; for every Stack gained, take HP damage equal to 1% of max HP (this effect does not reduce this unit's HP below 1)
[EndBattle] Apply 1 [Agility] next turn to ([Binding] on self / 3) other allies with the slowest Speed (once per turn; rounded down)
data.name: The Wick of Burned Feathers
